title: Really Riot....?? I locked in
body:
This happened a couple of times from time to time and it really annoys the hell outta me when it does.
So what happens is I'm in champ select for ranked, and I lock in, it says there was an error in selecting my champion and says I dodged queue. I had to wait 15 min/30 min/30 min. I really wanted to play then cus I wouldn't be able to play for quite a while, and good job riot. You messed it up. I was really irritated by this and hope you fix it soon enough.
